examples.korean: The contractions started coming every five minutes. 발음듣기 진통이 5분 간격으로 몰려오기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The contractions started coming every five minutes. 발음

examples.korean: a half-hourly bus service 발음듣기 30분 간격으로 운행하는 버스 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Trains leave at hourly intervals. 발음듣기 기차는 1시간 간격으로 출발한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Trains leave at hourly intervals. 발음

examples.korean: evenly spaced at four cm apart 발음듣기 고르게 4센티미터 간격으로 된 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: evenly spaced at four cm apart 발음

examples.korean: The noise came at two-minute intervals. 발음듣기 그 소리는 2분 간격으로 들려왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The noise came at two-minute intervals. 발음
